content.value:
No dribbly candles around the pentacle this time. Not for this summoning. Nor had she drawn blood. She hoped that could be avoided.
She put the box in the centre of the pentacle and closed her eyes. When she looked again her cat was in the box.
"There you are. Ready for the vet?"
